wikipedia_page.main: Gary John Innes (born 7 October 1977) is an English former footballer who played as a forward in the Football League for Darlington. He began his career with Sheffield United, though never played for their first team, spent a short spell with League of Ireland club Waterford United, and played non-league football for numerous clubs in the north-east of England. He represented England at youth level.

response: Gary Innes (born 13 December 1980) is a Scottish musician, former Shinty International captain, Composer and a broadcaster from Spean Bridge, Lochaber, Scotland.

On 5 April 2020 Innes started presenting a new Sunday show called Take the Floor - Your Requests on BBC Radio Scotland which the station changed the name of on 22 Nov 2020 to Your Requests with Gary Innes
*Gary Innes Helps Fort William to 2007 Camanachd Cup Final
